articles.title: The Jan. 6 riot hearings are delivering some startling testimony. Are they changing minds? - CBC News
articles.description: Despite weeks of headline-making testimony, it seems unclear how much the hearings into the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol are resonating with the American public, or changing minds.

articles.title: New Chelsea owner Todd Boehly may want to trade players, but here's why it doesn't happen in soccer - ESPN
articles.description: Trading players in the MLB, NBA and other American sports is commonplace. But new Chelsea owner Todd Boehly won't be able to conduct transfer business in the same way.
